qas.question: In terms of education in Swaziland what does the acronym SIMPA represent?

answers.text: Swaziland Institute of Management and Public Administration
a government owned management and development institute

qas.question: In which locations is the Institute of Development Management?
What service does the IDM provide?

answers.text: training, consultancy, and research in management

qas.question: In what year was the Mananga Management Centre founded?
What development and management istitute is privatly owned?

context: In addition to these institutions, Swaziland also has the <a0_0>Swaziland Institute of Management and Public Administration<a0_0/> (SIMPA) and Institute of Development Management (IDM). <b6_0>SIMPA<b6_0/> is <a1_0>a government owned management and development institute<a1_0/> and IDM is a regional organisation in <a2_0>Botswana, Lesotho and Swaziland<a2_0/> that provides <a3_0>training, consultancy, and research in management<a3_0/>. The Mananga management centre was established as Mananga Agricultural Management Centre in <a4_0><b5_0>1972<b5_0/><a4_0/> as an International Management Development Centre catering for middle and senior managers, it is located at Ezulwini.
